code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import{logger}from"redux-logger";import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from'../reducer';import{SHOP_CART}from'../utils/constant';import{persistStore}from'redux-persist';import{createStateSyncMiddleware}from'redux-state-sync';var environment=process.env.NODE_ENV||"development";var isDevelopment=environment==="development";isDevelopment=false;var reduxStateSyncConfig={whitelist:[SHOP_CART.GET_ITEM_CART_SUCCESS]};var middleware=[thunkMiddleware,createStateSyncMiddleware(reduxStateSyncConfig)];if(isDevelopment)middleware.push(logger);var composeEnhancers=isDevelopment&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__?window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__:compose;var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));export var dispatch=store.dispatch;export var persistor=persistStore(store);export default store;
